Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back 2 FREE NIGHTS View gallery / Back Artique Resort Pool Artique Resort Living Area Artique Resort Balcony View Gold Coast Artique Resort &vert; Return flights • 7 nights Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Artique Surfers Paradise offers guests a unique and contemporary design. The resort is fully self-contained and provides rooms with choices of ocean, hinterland, river or Surfers Paradise views for your enjoyment. State-of-the-art guest facilities ensure plenty of enjoyment and relaxation, while safe, patrolled golden beaches are just metres from your door. World-class shopping, cafes, family entertainment and the finest dining experiences on the Gold Coast are all just a short stroll from the resort. Suitable for couples and families. View more View less 7 nights + flights from $ 1179 per person share twin Flying with Jetstar 2 FREE NIGHTS Enquire now Sale Period : until 17 Nov by 4pm or until sold out Deal includes: Return Economy class airfares flying Jetstar direct to Gold Coast (includes 20kg checked bag & seat selection, per person) 7 nights accommodation 2 FREE nights FREE Wi-Fi 1 car park per booking The location is a real win: beach, tram, dining & shops- all nearby Heated outdoor pool (partially covered), spa, sauna, steam room, BBQ area, gym - plenty for downtime or family chill-out. With kitchens and laundry, you can feel more "at home" - perfect for the longer stays Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch Dunedin Hamilton Queenstown from Auckland One Bedroom Standard Apartment 1 x queen Auckland 7 night package from $1229 per person share twin Additional night from $139 per person share twin Travel 22 Feb - 25 Mar 26, 04 May - 17 Jun 26 Hamilton 7 night package from $1179 per person share twin Additional night from $139 per person share twin Departs Wednesdays, Fridays & Sundays Travel 22 Feb - 29 Mar 26, 06 May - 24 Jun 26 Wellington 7 night package from $1279 per person share twin Additional night from $139 per person share twin Departs Wednesdays, Fridays & Sundays Travel 22 Feb - 29 Mar 26, 06 May - 24 Jun 26 Christchurch 7 night package from $1309 per person share twin Additional night from $139 per person share twin Departs Mondays, Thursdays & Saturdays Travel 23 Feb - 30 Mar 26, 07 May - 22 Jun 26 Dunedin 7 night package from $1269 per person share twin Additional night from $139 per person share twin Departs Tuesdays, Thursdays & Saturdays Travel 24 Feb - 31 Mar 26, 30 Apr - 23 Jun 26 Queenstown 7 night package from $1279 per person share twin Additional night from $139 per person share twin Departs Mondays, Tuesdays, Thursdays & Saturdays Travel 23 Feb - 31 Mar 26, 05 May - 09 Jun 26 Please note the room images displayed are suggestive only as the apartments are individually owned and furnished. Gold Coast Sightseeing Optional Add-ons Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary General Admission Experience our native Australian wildlife unlike ever before at Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary, located on the Southern Gold Coast. Your ticket includes admission to the Sanctuary, use of the miniature train, access to the Lost Valley, Extinction Trail, Wild Island Adventure Splash Zone, interactive shows & presentations, and our the new precinct, Outback Springs! Learn all about the Sanctuary’s extensive conservation initiatives and enjoy wide open spaces as you admire iconic species such as the kangaroo, Tasmanian devil, Koala, wombat, echidna, reptiles, colourful parrots & cockatoos, and so much more! Includes: • Includes admission to the Sanctuary • Use of the miniature train • Access to the Lost Valley, Extinction Trail, Wild Island Adventure Splash Zone, interactive shows & presentations and Outback Springs. Operates: Daily except April 25 and December 25 Opening hours: 9am-4pm Price from $72 per adult, $56 per child (3-13 years), Family pass from $239 per family (2 adults & 2 children 3-13 yrs) Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary - Grazy Arvo with Koalas Relax and enjoy an afternoon with our Koalas. Spend some time with our Aussie icons in our exclusive Koala Habitat area while you indulge in a scrumptious grazing platter with hand-selected cheeses, breads and antipasto delights prepared by our Sanctuary chefs, plus a glass of wine, beer or soft drink. Surrounded by Koalas, chat with our keepers, enjoy a koala interaction, and have the moment captured by our professional photographer to take home and cherish forever. Includes: • Grazing Platter (selection seasonal fruits, breads, cheeses and antipasto) • Beverage (choice of alcoholic beverage for 18+) • Pat & chat style encounter hosted by our experienced Koala keepers • 1 x Koala cuddle and photo per paying guest • General admission to Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary (from 9am). Operates: Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday Time: 2pm Duration: 1 hour Price from $155 per adult, $145 per child (3-13 years) Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary Breakfast with Koalas Head to our Koala Habitat, home to everyone’s favorite Aussie icon, for a breakfast experience like no other. Indulge in a gourmet breakfast, surrounded by Koalas, chat with our Koala Specialists, enjoy a Koala interaction, and have the moment captured by our professional photographer to take home and cherish forever. Learn about Koalas as a species, their unique adaptations, and the conservation efforts that Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary are involved in. Afterwards, explore more of the Sanctuary at your leisure. Includes: Includes general admission to the Sanctuary, gourmet set menu breakfast (four choices), beverage (tea, coffee or juice), pat & chat style encounter, Koala photo & professional photo to take home. Operates: Saturday, Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday Time: 8am Duration: 1 hour Price from $155 per adult, $145 per child (3-13years) Jellurgal Walkabout Small Group Tour Discover the heart of the Gold Coast on the Jellurgal Walkabout Tour. Led by an Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander guide, this immersive experience connects you with the Yugambeh language-speaking people as you explore Burleigh Headland’s stunning landscapes. Start at the Jellurgal Aboriginal Cultural Centre, where an audio-visual presentation introduces you to Dreaming stories and the deep connection local people have with the land. Then, enjoy a guided walk through Burleigh Heads National Park, uncovering sacred sites, traditional bush tucker, and the practices that have sustained this land for thousands of years. Marvel at breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean, spot dolphins and sea eagles, and learn about the cultural significance of Tallebudgera Creek and Echo Beach. Book your Jellurgal Walkabout Tour today for an unforgettable journey through culture, nature, and history! Includes: Guided Cultural Experience – Led by a knowledgeable Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander guide. Operates: Daily Duration: 1 hour cruise Price from $69 per adult, $35 per child (5-14 yrs) Paradise Jet Boating : Jet Blast Ride Paradise Jet Boating has been operating since 2004 and is Australia’s leading jet boat operator. The rides have become famous for the great combination of thrills and adventure mixed with wonderful scenery and sightseeing. Enjoy a mixture of 360° spins, high-speed drifting and other exciting manoeuvres through the beautiful Gold Coast ‘Broadwater’. Scenery ranges from unspoilt Marine Park views while spotting dolphins, island wallabies and a wide variety of birdlife; to the amazing Superyachts and grand waterfront mansions of Sovereign Islands. Includes: • Tour • Life jackets • Storage lockers for personal belongings Operates: Daily except Christmas day Time: 9:15am, 10:15am, 1:15pm, 4:15pm Duration: 40 minutes Price from $75 per adult, $55 per child (4-14 years) Lady Elliot Island Day Tour (ex Gold Coast option) The Lady Elliot Island Great Barrier Reef all-inclusive Day Tour is the only one of its type in Australia. The visit allows you to view one of the most pristine sections of Australia’s Great Barrier Reef from the air as well as from above and below the water all in one day. Your tour commences with a pickup from your city hotel between 6.00 - 6.30 am and a complimentary transfer to the Airport for a scenic flight to the coral cay of Lady Elliot Island. Lady Elliot is regarded as one of the best snorkeling and diving locations on the reef, famous for its unspoilt coral reef and an amazing array of marine life! Upon arrival on Lady Elliot Island, the guide will take you on a brief orientation tour of the island and will escort you to the Day Guest facilities to collect your snorkel equipment. You will then join a glass-bottom boat & guided snorkel tour to view a large variety of coral and brilliantly colored fish, with the possibility to encounter turtles, dolphins, and the resident manta rays. A hot & cold buffet lunch is served in the Beachfront Dining Room and includes a choice of wine, beer, and soft drink. After lunch, join your guide for fish feeding in the Fish Pond, and at 2.30 pm, depart on a scenic flight back to the Airport. The tour concludes at between 4.15 pm - 4.30 pm with a return transfer back to your hotel. A light breakfast and afternoon tea (water & biscuit) are served inflight. Includes: • Return land Transfers (courtesy pick-up from selected accommodation - limited areas apply) • Welcome drink on arrival • Fully guided tour • In Flight receive light snack, afternoon tea, bottled water and biscuit • On Island receive tea and coffee • Combined glass bottom boat/guided snorkel tour • Hot & Cold Buffet lunch including fresh prawns, beer, wine & soft drink • Use of snorkel equipment (mask, snorkel, fins & short wetsuit) • Fish feeding in the Lagoon Fish Pool • Snorkel lesson (if required) • Afternoon activity (tide dependent) • Use of Day Guest facilities (storage facilities, shower facilities, towels, sunscreen, reef walking shoes) • Environmental Management Charge (EMC) • Return scenic flight to Lady Elliot Island Operates: Daily except Christmas Day Time: 6am-5pm Duration: 5hrs & 30 minutes Price from $1,109 per adult, $779 per child (3-12years) AU$50 Harbour Town Premium Outlets Gift Card Harbour Town Premium Outlets is Australia's largest Outlet shopping centre, all open-air, located on Queensland's Gold Coast, a 15 minute drive north from Surfers Paradise. Home to over 220 premium Outlets stores, including international brands and iconic Australian labels, offering huge savings of up to 70% off! You’ll always find a sale, with every store having a minimum of 30% off daily! And after all that shopping, sit back and enjoy a bit to eat or refreshing drink at Harbour Town Eats alfresco dining and entertainment precinct. Includes: 1x AU$50 Harbour town Gift Card (max 1 per booking) Operates: Daily except Good Friday (29 March 2025), ANZAC Day (25 April 2025) and Christmas Day (25 December 2025) Time: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday 9.00 am-5.30pm, Thursday-9.00am-7.00pm, Sunday 10.00am-5.00pm. Public Holiday Trading 10.00am-5.00pm Price from $35 - Please note selected eateries, supermarkets and entertainment venues operate outside Harbour Town’s official trading hours. Harbour Town trading hours are subject to change. For current trading hours, please refer to https://www.harbourtowngoldcoast.com.au/centre-services/opening-hours Aquaduck 1 Hour Tour Departing from the heart of Surfers Paradise, the iconic Aquaduck tour offers a perfect blend of city sightseeing and river cruising. See the sights of Surfers Paradise before experiencing the famous “splash down” into the Broadwater for a calm water cruise taking in the spectacular views of the Gold Coast. Kids even get to steer the duck on the water and take home a souvenir ‘Captains certificate’. Includes: Tour guide and on-board commentary. 20 Minute city tour and then 40 minutes river cruise. Operates: Daily Time : 09:45am, 10:15am, 11:00am, 11.30am, 12:15pm, 2pm, 2:15pm, 3:15pm, 3:30pm, 4:30pm, 4:45pm Duration: 1 hour Aquaduck tour Price from $65 per adult, $55 per child (2-16 years), $196 Family Pass (2A2C (2-11yrs)) Gold Coast Self-Drive Boat Rental Be your own boat captain with a leisurely cruise through the Gold Coast’s scenic canals. Even without experience or a boating license, you can pilot a canopy-covered electric vessel with room for up to 10 friends or family members. You decide where to go and when to stop, enjoying unparalleled views from the water of Gold Coast luxury homes, beaches, and marine life. Includes: Safety equipment Operates: Daily Duration: up to 4 hours Price from $189 for group of 1-10 people Gold Coast Skippered Canal Cruise Experience the beautiful Gold Coast on this private guided cruise. Enjoy a flexible itinerary - cruises last from one to five hours - and a quiet ride on this custom built boat with an electric motor. Check out amazing views of sites like Main Beach, Southport, Cronin’s Island, and Isle of Capri. Marvel at the million-dollar homes and gorgeous canals, elegant bridges and marine life that could include dolphins, turtles, and sea eagles. Includes: Skippered Sightseeing cruise Small-group tour (maximum of 10 people) Operates: Daily Duration: 1 hour cruise Price from $235 for group of 1-10 people Gold Coast Whale Watching Cruise Our experience is like no other! Onboard our new state-of-the-art vessel, we are able to get you to the whales a lot quicker, meaning more time watching whales and less time travelling! With 360 degree views from all positions onboard, and limited tickets onboard, you'll always have prime views and never have to battle crowds. Our professional crew onboard also offer great commentary of the whales through the surround speakers. Includes: All Fees and Taxes Operates: Jun-mid Oct 2026 Departs: 8.30am, 11.30am & 2.30pm departures (2.5hr tour) Duration: 2.5 hours Price from $109 per adult, $89 per child (1-16 yrs) Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings only from 09 -17 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 04 Nov 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Price is based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax and surcharge increases • Full payment is required at time of booking • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified • Some surcharges, closeouts, flight, routing and accommodation restrictions apply • Packages are subject to availability • Package prices are based on return Economy class airfares flying Jetstar to Gold Coast from Auckland, Hamilton, Wellington, Christchurch, Dunedin or Queenstown • Economy class fares include 20kg checked bag and seat selection, per person • Flights are restricted to selected day of the week schedules • Flights from Auckland to Gold Coast depart daily in both directions • Flights from Hamilton to Gold Coast depart Wednesday, Friday & Sunday in both directions • Flights from Wellington to Gold Coast depart Wednesday, Friday & Sunday in both directions • Flights from Christchurch to Gold Coast depart Monday, Thursday & Saturday in both directions • Flights from Dunedin to Gold Coast depart Tuesday, Thursday & Saturday in both directions • Flights from Queenstown to Gold Coast depart Monday, Tuesday, Thursday & Saturday in both directions • Day of the week surcharges may apply • Min/max stays apply • Share twin is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Airfares are non-refundable, non-transferable and name changes are not permitted • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 18 Sep 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Min/max numbers may apply for tours to operate. Fuel surcharges may be applied without notice payable direct. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
